DeploymentPreference.description: The settings to enable gradual state machine deployments.

properties.name: Alarms
properties.description: A list of CloudWatch alarm names that will be monitored during the deployment. The deployment will fail and rollback if any alarms go into ALARM state.

type.description: A list of CloudWatch alarm names that will be monitored during the deployment. The deployment will fail and rollback if any alarms go into ALARM state.

properties.name: Interval
properties.description: The time in minutes between each traffic shifting increment.

type.description: The time in minutes between each traffic shifting increment.

properties.name: Percentage
properties.description: The percentage of traffic to shift to the new version in each increment.

type.description: The percentage of traffic to shift to the new version in each increment.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of deployment to perform.

type.description: The type of deployment to perform.

RoutingConfiguration.description: The routing configuration of the alias. One or two versions can be mapped to an alias to split StartExecution requests of the same state machine.

properties.name: StateMachineVersionArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies one or two state machine versions defined in the routing configuration.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies one or two state machine versions defined in the routing configuration.

properties.name: Weight
properties.description: The percentage of traffic you want to route to the state machine version. The sum of the weights in the routing configuration must be equal to 100.

type.description: The percentage of traffic you want to route to the state machine version. The sum of the weights in the routing configuration must be equal to 100.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: An optional description of the alias.

type.description: An optional description of the alias.
